casebody.data:
YORK ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, PETITIONER, v. THE UNITED STATES THE UNITED STATES, PETITIONER v. YORK ENGINEERING & CONSTRUCTION COMPANY [Supreme Court No. 692] [Supreme Court No. 783] [Court of Claims No. 45282] [103 C. Cls. 613 ;

327 U. S. —]

Government contract; agreement to employ labor from relief rolls; delay due to shortage of labor.

Petitions for writs of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court March 4, 1946.
